description:
Touch takes blue candy. Hutch gets lost at the mall. Great yogi Muthu is on his 11th, going on 10th day of his fast. Doronjo pitches Biotech Beauty Gel Alpha Beta Nano Thirteen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Otona ni Nacchatta Touch / Hutch: Depart de Maigo / Yoga no Tatsujin Mutu-san Raijitsu / Good Buy Shopping (Biyou Cream Hen)
Touch, All Grown Up / Hutch the Honeybee, Lost at the Mall / The Master Yogi, Muthu-san, Comes to Japan / Good Buy Shopping
大人になっちゃったタッチ / ハッチ デパートで迷子 / ヨガの達人ムトゥさん来日 / グッバイ・ショッピング(美容クリーム編)
